name: Fluorite Crystal Gemstone Point
description:
This hand cut and polished Fluorite crystal point can help eliminate negative energy around you and accumulation in the body. This effective energy tool can help increase your intuitive abilities, connecting with Spirit and your higher being. This stone should be cleansed often by allowing it to sit in the moonlight (best is during a full moon) or soak up sunlight during the day. 
Height approx 3.5-5.0"
Crystals you purchase may have some slight variances from the stock photo pictured.
